attributes.action: allow Jack Tweedy to be allowed to spend his wedding night with his wife
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know the terrible news about Jade Goody and that her battle with cancer has been fought and is now lost. Given this, we would like Gordon Brown to overturn the ruling that Jack Tweedy has to reside at his mother;s address on his wedding night. We are aware that he has commited a crime and his release was granted on the condition that he remain on curfew between 7pm and 7am. We are simply asking that you grant one act of kindness for Jade Goody that she is able to spend her first night as a married woman with the man she loves.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
